backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the backend that handles user profiles, contact form submissions, photo/video storage, and access-controlled admin operations using blob storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two completed features: fixing the Awards & Recognition section image rendering on both the About page and Home page to correctly display four award photos with valid src paths and proper CSS sizing.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key content of each component, page, hook, and configuration file in the React application.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with routes for Home, About, Programs, Donations, Gallery, Contact, and Admin pages, all nested under a shared Layout route.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying Manavdeep Seva Trust branding, quick navigation links, founder and office contact details, copyright notice, and a Caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper that renders the Navigation header, a main content area via Outlet, and the Footer to provide a consistent page shell.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive sticky navigation header with the trust logo, desktop and mobile menus for seven links, and a conditionally shown Admin link when the user is authenticated via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, and persisting identity across page reloads via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for backend operations including submitting contact forms, uploading/deleting photos and videos, and fetching all photos and videos via the ICP actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines a warm, earthy CSS custom property color palette for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: About page component displaying the organization's founder profile, her books, and awards with images and descriptive text sections.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Admin page component that allows authenticated users to upload and delete photos and videos, with Internet Identity login gating and progress tracking for uploads.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page for Manavdeep Seva Trust with a hero section, contact info (founder, address, phone), and a form that submits via the `useContactForm` mutation hook with a success notification.
frontend/src/pages/Donations.tsx: Donations page displaying impact statistics, preset donation amounts with descriptions, and payment method instructions (UPI, bank transfer) for Manavdeep Seva Trust.
frontend/src/pages/Gallery.tsx: Gallery page with tabbed Photos/Videos sections; photos combine a static list of 30+ local JPEG assets with dynamically fetched photos, and videos are fetched via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page featuring a hero banner, founder profile with books and awards carousels, and sections highlighting the trust's mission, programs, and calls to action.
frontend/src/pages/Programs.tsx: Programs page that renders a grid of six initiative cards (Education, Environment, Healthcare, Community, Skills, Agriculture) each with an icon, description, and detail list.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors via oklch variables, fonts, border radii, shadows, keyframes) and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file (version 57) recording existing features, known issues, architectural notes, and requirement IDs for a charitable trust website with an admin panel.
